The way a mendicant who develops and cul: A mendicant develops the awakening factors of mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, immersion, and equanimity
These awakening factors rely on seclusion, fading away, and cessation
These awakening factors ripen as letting go
A mendicant who develops and cultivates the seven awakening factors slants, slopes, and inclines to extinguishment.
